sentences.sContent: ...The state’s facilities management project team is still in the process of developing its business justification and expects to have that completed and available to the public at the end of February...
...IMO team took part in MathCounts as middle school students...
...Students join a team through their schools...
...What did Pen Huddle and his team do in the Arctic Ocean...
...British explorer Pen Huddle and his team trekked for three months across the frozen Arctic Ocean...
...Lead author Liat Tikotzky wrote in an email that the research team also didn't measure fathers' sleep...
...Whether it's a sports team or a presidential campaign...
...George Martin and his team of engineers were forced to apply every ounce of their creativity to solve the problems posed to them by Lennon and McCartney...
...A scientific team is studying the thinking ability of eleven and half month old children...
...While the team can't be sure their results are due solely to Obama...
black trousers teamed with a bright shirt
You can team up with one other class member if you want.
sentences.sCn: 例句：如果你愿意的话，可以找一个同学组成一组。

phrases.pCn: n. 团队精神；合作精神
配合，协力；工作小组；协同工作
具有团队精神的人；良好的合作伙伴；善于团队合作的人
一线队；首发阵容；第一阵容
生产队；制作组；生产大队

trans.tranOther: to put two things or people together, because they will look good or work well together
